/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of mostly white, red, and blue, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure.
